properties.areaDesc: Straits of Florida from Craig Key to west end of Seven Mile Bridge 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to Craig Key 20 to 60 NM out; Straits of Florida from west end of Seven Mile Bridge to south of Halfmoon Shoal 20 to 60 NM out
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 1 at 4:37PM EST by NWS Key West FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include... Straits of Florida from Ocean Reef to
American Shoal 20 to 60 nm out...

At 435 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists detected a
line of thunderstorms, capable of producing wind gusts near 30 knots.
These thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 nm
south of Marathon Humps to 40 nm southeast of Wood's Wall East
Crack, moving east at 25 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Elbow Cay.

Prepare for thunderstorms with wind gusts near 30 knots...locally
rough and confused seas...occasional lightning strikes...and
potentially blinding downpours.

NWSheadline: LINE OF THUNDERSTORMS OVER THE OFFSHORE STRAITS OF FLORIDA
